subject: Dog Sledding
Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race (Alaska)
lead_paragraph: The 2010 Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race was turning into a two-man contest between the former champions Lance Mackey and Jeff King.
snippet: The 2010 Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race was turning into a two-man contest between the former champions Lance Mackey and Jeff King.
